org.batfish.dataplane.protocols

Class OspfProtocolHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.batfish.dataplane.protocols.OspfProtocolHelper

  • public class OspfProtocolHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class with functions that implement various bits of OSPF protocol logic.

    • Method Detail

      • computeUpdatedOspfSummaryMetric

        @Nullable
public static java.lang.Long computeUpdatedOspfSummaryMetric(OspfInternalRoute route,
                                                                       Prefix areaPrefix,
                                                                       @Nullable
                                                                       java.lang.Long currentMetric,
                                                                       long areaNum,
                                                                       boolean useMin)
        Decides whether the current OSPF summary route metric needs to be changed based on the given route's metric.

        Routes from the same area or outside of areaPrefix have no effect on the summary metric.

        Parameters:
        route - The route in question, whose metric is considered
        areaPrefix - The Ip prefix of the OSPF area
        currentMetric - The current summary metric for the area
        areaNum - Area number.
        useMin - Whether to use the older RFC 1583 computation, which takes the minimum of metrics as opposed to the newer RFC 2328, which uses the maximum
        Returns:
        the newly computed summary metric.

      • isOspfInterAreaDefaultOriginationAllowed

        public static boolean isOspfInterAreaDefaultOriginationAllowed(OspfProcess process,
                                                               OspfProcess neighborProc,
                                                               OspfArea neighborArea)
        Decide whether a default inter-area OSPF route should be originated by neighbor
        Parameters:
        process - the receiving node's OspfProcess
        neighborProc - The adjacent OspfProcess
        neighborArea - The propagator's OSPF area configuration
        Returns:
        true iff the route should be considered for installation into the OSPF RIB

      • isOspfInterAreaFromInterAreaPropagationAllowed

        public static boolean isOspfInterAreaFromInterAreaPropagationAllowed(OspfProcess proc,
                                                                     long linkAreaNum,
                                                                     Configuration neighbor,
                                                                     OspfProcess neighborProc,
                                                                     OspfInternalRoute neighborRoute,
                                                                     OspfArea neighborArea)
        Decide whether an inter-area OSPF route can be sent from neighbor's area to given area.
        Parameters:
        proc - The process of the receiver
        linkAreaNum - The area ID of the link
        neighbor - The adjacent node with which route exchange is happening
        neighborProc - The adjacent OspfProcess
        neighborRoute - OspfInternalRoute in questions
        neighborArea - The propagator's OSPF area configuration
        Returns:
        true iff the route should be considered for installation into the OSPF RIB

      • isOspfInterAreaFromIntraAreaPropagationAllowed

        public static boolean isOspfInterAreaFromIntraAreaPropagationAllowed(long linkAreaNum,
                                                                     Configuration neighbor,
                                                                     OspfProcess neighborProc,
                                                                     OspfInternalRoute neighborRoute,
                                                                     OspfArea neighborArea)
        Decide whether an intra-area OSPF route can be sent from neighbor's area to given area.
        Parameters:
        linkAreaNum - The area ID of the link
        neighbor - The adjacent node with which route exchange is happening
        neighborProc - The adjacent OspfProcess
        neighborRoute - OspfInternalRoute in questions
        neighborArea - The propagator's OSPF area configuration
        Returns:
        true iff the route should considered for installation into the OSPF RIB
